author: Jessica
excerpt: I can’t believe we are 15 weeks into the year! We had another packed week. We did so much! Jordy had a little trip to the children’s museum. He loves it. I can’t handle him! My style icon. Some hockey. On the edge of the blade! These two went to a cat cafe and were […]
text: I can’t believe we are 15 weeks into the year! We had another packed week. We did so much! Jordy had a little trip to the children’s museum. He loves it. I can’t handle him! My style icon. Some hockey. On the edge of the blade! These two went to a cat cafe and were obsessed. They both ADORE animals. Like adore. We also went to the science center! It was super fun. They were super cute. Another outfit choice. Lots of Easy Everyday stuff! This weekend we celebrated two birthdays!! Baby Lucy and.. My niece Violet! Cutest cousins. I can’t handle Lucy. Also why is Max 18. Lucy followed him all around all day. It was soooo cute. The oldest and the youngest! We all adore her! Little bff walk. And Masters weekend! In last year’s cup, but just as good. Now… it’s Easy Everyday week!!!!
html:
I can’t believe we are 15 weeks into the year!

We had another packed week. We did so much!

Jordy had a little trip to the children’s museum.

He loves it.

I can’t handle him!

My style icon.

Some hockey.

On the edge of the blade!

These two went to a cat cafe and were obsessed. They both ADORE animals. Like adore.

We also went to the science center!

It was super fun.

They were super cute.

Another outfit choice.

Lots of Easy Everyday stuff!

This weekend we celebrated two birthdays!!

Baby Lucy and..

My niece Violet!

Cutest cousins.

I can’t handle Lucy.

Also why is Max 18.

Lucy followed him all around all day.

It was soooo cute.

The oldest and the youngest!

We all adore her!

Little bff walk.

And Masters weekend!

In last year’s cup, but just as good. Now… it’s Easy Everyday week!!!!
